option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
""" Job Indexing Service for syncing jobs to Weaviate """ import logging
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
class JobIndexingService: """Service for indexing jobs to Weaviate"""
@staticmethod def sync_single_job_to_weaviate(job_id): """ Sync a single job to Weaviate
Args: job_id: ID of the job to sync
Returns: bool: True if successful, False otherwise """ try: from ..models import JobPostings, JobDescription from .weaviate_service import index_job, delete_job
# Get job from database try: job = JobPostings.objects.select_related('recruiter').prefetch_related( 'jobdescription_set__jd_skill' ).get(id=job_id) except JobPostings.DoesNotExist: logger.warning(f"Job {job_id} not found in database") return False
# If job is not active, remove from Weaviate if job.status != 'ACTIVE': return delete_job(job_id)
# Prepare job data for indexing skills = [jd.jd_skill.name for jd in job.jobdescription_set.all()]
job_data = { 'job_id': job.id, 'title': job.title, 'description': job.description or '', 'skills': skills, 'company_name': job.recruiter.company_name, 'address': job.address or '', }
# Index to Weaviate return index_job(job_data)
except Exception as e: logger.error(f"Error syncing job {job_id} to Weaviate: {str(e)}") return False
